data.title: The Four Seasons Quiz
data.meta_description: The Four Seasons is one of my all-time favorite romantic comedies. There is so much to learn there about love, life, and reality. I hope you enjoy the quiz.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. Who wrote, directed, and starred in 'The Four Seasons'?

Answer: Alan Alda

Alan Alda's triple role in the production of 'The Four Seasons' leaves no doubt about the immense talent he possesses.

2. What actor and actress portrayed the roles of Jack and Kate?

Answer: Alan Alda and Carol Burnett

3. Who played the roles of Nick and Annie?

Answer: Len Cariou and Sandy Dennis

4. Who played Danny and Claudia?

Answer: Jack Weston and Rita Moreno

5. Who is Ginny?

Answer: Nick's new love interest

Ginny is Nick's first love interest after he leaves his wife.

6. Which couple gets a divorce near the beginning of the movie?

Answer: Nick and Annie

Nick and Annie split up after he announces that he is bored with her and needs a change.

7. What does Annie do for a living?

Answer: Photographs vegetables

Annie is a photographer who has spent the previous 3 years exclusively taking photos of vegetables.

8. What do all the characters do together at least once a season?

Answer: Go on vacation together

9. Where does Ginny make her first appearance in the movie?

Answer: On the sailboat

Ginny accompanies Nick on the sailing trip, which upsets the other couples. They resent Ginny's presence and miss Annie.

10. What kept everyone awake on the sailboat?

Answer: Nick and Ginny making love

11. Which character is afraid of the elastic in his underwear?

Answer: Danny

Danny is afraid of many things including the elastic in his underwear.

12. What happens to Danny's Mercedes?

Answer: It falls through the ice

The other characters drive Danny's car onto the ice to save his life and it falls through and sinks.

13. What two characters are injured while trying to show off their skiing prowess to Ginny?

Answer: Jack and Nick

Jack sprains his ankle and Nick breaks his leg while going over a ski jump to impress Ginny.

14. Which character becomes pregnant during the movie?

Answer: Ginny

Ginny is pregnant which causes some concern when she runs out into the snow alone.

15. What two ancient emotions does Danny claim has kept their friendship together over the years?

Answer: Fear and panic

Before they learn of Nick's and Annie's separation, Danny says fear and panic have kept them together and saved them from divorce.

Source: Author DillPickle

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor rj211 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
